description: Comprehensive training dataset for HTML rendering with template mixing

training_readiness.notes: Comprehensive coverage of HTML rendering patterns with 14 positive examples showing progression from basic elements to complex template mixing. Covers void elements, databinding in both content and attributes, and integration with control flow. 5 negative examples teach XML compliance and common errors.

positive: positive/databinding_in_html.json (4 examples) - Dynamic content and attributes

usage_instructions.for_llm_training: Use positive examples to teach HTML generation within Quantum components. Show progression from simple static HTML to complex dynamic templates with databinding and control flow. Negative examples teach XML compliance requirements.
usage_instructions.for_developers: Reference these examples when learning HTML rendering. Start with simple_html, progress to void_elements, then databinding, finally mixed_content for full template mixing.
usage_instructions.for_testing: Each positive example represents a valid test case. Negative examples define expected parser errors.

example_diversity.implementation_styles: Shows 3-4 different approaches per pattern type
example_diversity.use_cases: Static pages, forms, dynamic content, lists, tables, conditional rendering
example_diversity.multiple_solutions: Same output achievable via different approaches (static vs dynamic, nested vs flat)

integration_with_other_features.databinding: Variables resolved in HTML content and attributes

rendering_pipeline.parse: HTML elements parsed to HTMLNode/TextNode AST
rendering_pipeline.execute: Control flow determines which HTML nodes render
rendering_pipeline.databind: Variables resolved in TextNode content and attributes
rendering_pipeline.render: HTMLNode rendered to HTML string output
